description:
When Keroro gets a cold, he loses his voice! Is there a frog in his throat? Later, Fuyuki and Kululu are pursued below the streets of Akihabara. Amid all of the mysterious, out-of-place artifacts, can they find a way to fight back against their well-armed opponent?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro If You Catch a Cold, It`ll be Fixed in Post-production!? / Fuyuki & Kururu Go to Akihabara
ケロロ 風邪をひいたらアフレコだ!? / 冬樹 & クルル 秋葉原を行く
